channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marqeta Inc: Strong Q4 Earnings and Strategic Moves Drive Growth
item.description: As of February 27, 2025, Marqeta Inc (MQ) has seen a significant gain in its stock price, with an increase of +21.94% over the past day. This surge is...

item.title: ‘Shocked’ reaction to White House Zelensky meeting sends Europe defense stocks soaring
item.description: JPMorgan lifts price targets of European defense companies by an average of 25% after furious reaction in European capitals to Trump-Zelensky meeting.

item.title: ROOT Stock: A 586% Rally in 2024 – What’s Behind the Surge?
item.description: As investors, we’re always on the lookout for stocks that are making headlines and delivering impressive gains. And today, I want to shine a spotlight...

item.title: ‘I have yelled, screamed and cried’: My mother gave $400K to scammers over Facebook. She still gives them Apple gift cards. What can I do?
item.description: “I have been living a nightmare with my mother for seven years.”

item.title: Hedge funds are buying more of these 'rising star' stocks, according to Goldman
item.description: A change in hedge fund popularity could signal where a stock is headed in the months to come, and there are some that may be poised for future gains.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on the long-term potential of these stocks
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three stocks favored by Wall Street, including Booking Holdings and Visa.

item.title: The economy’s at risk of plunging into an air pocket, says JPMorgan. What that would mean for stocks now and in the future.
item.description: Investors are brushing aside the possibilities of more turbulence to come for the U.S. economy and potential fallout for markets, warns JPMorgan.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas names struggling Tesla a top pick, sees nearly 50% comeback
item.description: Analyst Adam Jonas has an overweight rating on the stock, and his $430 price target implies about 46.8% potential upside for Tesla shares.

item.title: These are the posh mansions that new FBI deputy director Dan Bongino owns
item.description: Bangino currently holds the keys to at least one multi-million property in Florida, plus a home in Maryland.

item.title: China investing risks haven’t gone away. Wall Street shares some of its safer plays
item.description: As excitement over DeepSeek moderated, JPMorgan gave its clients a warning: "Be careful: U.S.-China risks back in focus."

item.title: Activist Elliott takes a stake in Aspen Technology and pushes back on an offer from Emerson
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has a $1.5 billion stake in Aspen Technology, and the activist disagrees with a tender offer from Emerson Electric.

item.title: A dear friend, 91, wants to add me to the deed of his house. His daughter died and he’s not close to his son. Is that a good idea?
item.description: “What is the best way to add my name, so there are no issues upon his death?”
